attributes.action: Stop giving asylum seekers / foreigners free houses and our money in the UK !
attributes.additional_details:
Working Family's across the Uk will suffer next year all because the migration problem and working family tax credit being stopped for genuine family's on low income. 

12,000 non nationals living outside the UK are receiving child tax credit. And to solve the problem the Government will stop English people who generally need the extra income rather than stopping paying the foreigners in the first place. Family's will plummet into poverty to foot the bill for the migrant problem nice !
attributes.background: England is in trouble and all we do is give handouts to foreigners before we look after are own nation. Protect are country and children's future. All the money we are throwing away with this never ending problem is simple to fix. Do not pay money out unless they have paid in tax and insurance.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105592

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
